property.name: xasecure.audit.is.enabled
property.description: Boolean flag to specify if the plugin should generate access audit logs. Default: true

property.name: xasecure.audit.solr.is.enabled
property.description: Boolean flag to specify if audit logs should be stored in Solr. Default: false

property.name: xasecure.audit.solr.solr_url
property.description: URL to Solr deployment where the plugin should send access audits to
